lead_paragraph: The group of funds, which own bonds on the island, based part of their suit on a confidential report that found the Government Development Bank insolvent.

headline.print_headline: With Suit, Hedge Funds  Seek to Freeze the Assets of a Top Puerto Rico Bank
headline.main: Hedge Funds Sue to Freeze Puerto Rico Bank’s Assets

snippet: The group of funds, which own bonds on the island, based part of their suit on a confidential report that found the Government Development Bank insolvent.
abstract: Group of hedge funds owning government bonds issued by Puerto Rico file request in federal court to freeze assets of commonwealth's Government Development Bank, which faces $422 debt payment upon which it is likely to default.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Government Development Bank for Puerto Rico
